title: Nerawareta Gakuen (Psychic School Wars)
synopsis: Very little changes in Kenji Seki's daily routine. Every morning, he takes his dog to the beach in the hopes of catching a glimpse of his classmate, Kahori Harukawa, while she surfs. Afterward, he meets up with his neighbor and childhood friend, Natsuki Suzuura, and they walk to school. In essence, he lives an idyllic life where the only thing he has to worry about is how to finally confess his feelings to Kahori.
characters: ['Suzuura, Natsuki', 'Seki, Kenji', 'Harukawa, Kahori', 'Kyougoku, Ryouichi', 'Yamagiwa, Yuriko', 'Jinno, Yuu', 'Saitou', 'Seki, Mother', 'Tooyama, Riku', 'Nakajima, Jou']
